argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | itgadd.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) |
| 2 |  | itgadd.2 | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) |
| 3 |  | itgadd.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) |
| 4 |  | itgadd.4 | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_iblmbf | |- ( ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_mbfmptcl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_iblmbf | |- ( ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. MblFn ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. MblFn ) |
| 10 | 9, 3 | #P_mbfmptcl | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_negsubd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( B + -u C ) = ( B - C ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B + -u C ) ) = ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10 | #P_negcld | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> -u C e. CC ) |
| 14 | 3, 4 | #P_iblneg | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> -u C ) e. L^1 ) |
| 15 | 7, 2, 13, 14 | #P_ibladd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B + -u C ) ) e. L^1 ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B - C ) ) e. L^1 ) |
